thread.title: VOTE: Pick your dream new GP!
thread.title_full: VOTE: Pick your dream new GP!

title: VOTE: Pick your dream new GP!
text:
VOTE: London? New York? Las Vegas? Pick your dream new F1 GP! Last Updated: 26/01/17 2:43pm Liberty Media are keen to expand Formula 1 on a global scale and new chief Chase Carey has hinted at potential new grands prix in the US and UK. But where do you want to see the sport head to next? 
The list below features both new and old circuits, just press the 'upvote' button on the destination where you would like to see a race in the future. Also See:
